title: California Probate Calculator
description: Given Probate can be very costly, time-intensive, and litigious, it is critically important to create a trust. This probate calculator calculates the higher costs your family may bear if you do not have an estate plan. The probate cost compares to the cost of creating a trust in California and highlights why it's important to create a trust. Please check out the Loom video to see the tool in action and learn more.
